I edited the subtitles that Bagrawr linked to for spelling and grammar errors (e.g.: "You are a rootless bastard," where "rootless" is supposed to be "ruthless.") You can find the English-corrected copy here:
http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/subtitles/4002441/i-saw-the-devil-en

not to be a dick--i love the torrent and thank you thank you--but to help us get the title right in korean:

it's pronounced, "Akmareul boatda".  the Korean "ss" is in a position that makes it pronounced like a hard "d".  Spell it with a "t" or it sounds ridiculous when saying it.  ^^
